m_szDocTitle: White Model X Spy Pics Surface On Twitter | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: White Model X Spy Pics Surface On Twitter Originally published on EV Obsession . It was just a few weeks ago that we got the first spy pics of a Tesla Model X beta testing . It was painted black with minimal camouflage and I thought it looked hot. Some more spy pics have just surfaced of a white Model X , also with minimal camouflage. I have to admit that I’m siding with Chris and his “meh” reaction  now. Or, as Chris stated in his new post about the new spy pics, “I am going to reserve my final judgement until the Model X has been fully revealed.” I have long thought the Model X would come al
